body_html: It's because torch.nn.functions.conv imports torch.backends.cudnn, which imports torch.cuda every time and never catches an exception if it's not available. Dataparallel should have nothing to do with it.
body_text: It's because torch.nn.functions.conv imports torch.backends.cudnn, which imports torch.cuda every time and never catches an exception if it's not available. Dataparallel should have nothing to do with it.
body: It's because `torch.nn.functions.conv` imports `torch.backends.cudnn`, which imports `torch.cuda` every time and never catches an exception if it's not available. Dataparallel should have nothing to do with it.
